com.suarez.cordova.mapsforge

Class MapsforgeNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.suarez.cordova.mapsforge.MapsforgeNative

  • public class MapsforgeNative
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows you to create a mapsforge map directly in the device by adding the map view to the top of the current view content.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Adolfo Fernandez Suarez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MapsforgeNative INSTANCE
      Remember to initialize this instance with MapsforgeNative.createInstance in order to avoid getting a null object, and therefore NullPointerException when invoking any method.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static MapsforgeNative INSTANCE
        Remember to initialize this instance with MapsforgeNative.createInstance in order to avoid getting a null object, and therefore NullPointerException when invoking any method.

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static void createInstance(Activity context,
                  java.lang.String mapFilePath,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Creates a new instance of MapsforgeNative.
        Parameters:
        context - The context obtained from the main plugin class through this.cordova.getActivity()
        mapFilePath - Absolute path to the map file that will be used. Set it up even if you will change to an online tile provider
        width - MapView width. Set it to 0 in order to MATCH_PARENT
        height - MapView height. Set it to 0 in order to MATCH_PARENT

      • addMarker

        public int addMarker(int drawableId,
            double lat,
            double lng)
        Adds a new marker to the MapView at the specified location. The returned id is the one that has to be used in order to delete the marker from the MapView through the method deleteLayer.
        Parameters:
        drawableId - Id of the image that will be placed as marker
        lat - Latitude
        lng - Longitude
        Returns:
        The identifier of the marker that has been created
        See Also:
        deleteLayer(int)

      • addPolyline

        public int addPolyline(int color,
              int strokeWidth,
              JSONArray points)
                throws JSONException
        Adds a new polyline to the MapView using the coordinates passed as points. That array uses the values in odd positions for the latitude, and the even positions for the longitude. The returned value is the identifier needed to delete the polyline from the view.
        Parameters:
        color - Color for the polyline
        strokeWidth - Width
        points - Array of doubles with the coordinates
        Returns:
        The identifier for delete the polyline in the future
        Throws:
        JSONException - If the arguments passed as points can not be retrieved as doubles
        See Also:
        deleteLayer(int)

      • deleteLayer

        public void deleteLayer(int key)
        Deletes an element that has been added to the layer manager such markers and polylines.
        Parameters:
        key - The identifier for the layer to delete

      • destroyCache

        public void destroyCache(boolean destroy)
        Sets the flag to delete the cache when the onDestroy method is called.
        Parameters:
        destroy - True to delete the cache, false to keep it.

      • getCacheName

        public java.lang.String getCacheName()
        The cache name is the name of the folder that is created under the cache application directory.
        Returns:
        The name of the cache

      • getContext

        public Activity getContext()
        The context is where the MapView will be added when it is created.
        Returns:
        The context used for creating the MapView.

      • getGraphicFactory

        public org.mapsforge.map.android.graphics.AndroidGraphicFactory getGraphicFactory()
        The AndroidGraphicFactory instance is used internally with mapsforge so it can render the tiles.
        Returns:
        The instance of AndroidGraphicFactory used at the moment.

      • getMapFilePath

        public java.lang.String getMapFilePath()
        Gets the map file that is being used for rendering the offline map.
        Returns:
        Absolute path to the map file.

      • getRenderThemePath

        public java.lang.String getRenderThemePath()
        The render theme is used to render the tiles with different styles, such only the buildings, use different colors, etc.
        Returns:
        Absolute path to the theme file.

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hides the MapView so you can show any other content. This is useful since the view is added directly to the application and otherwise it is not possible to change its visibility from the cordova application.
        See Also:
        show()

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Destroys the cache if the destroy flag is activated.
        See Also:
        destroyCache(boolean)

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Initializes the renderer layer that was being used when the onStop method was called.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Stops and cleans up the render layer.

      • setBuiltInZoomControls

        public void setBuiltInZoomControls(boolean builtInZoomControls)
        Sets the visibility to the built in zoom controls.
        Parameters:
        builtInZoomControls - True to show the controls, false to hide them.

      • setCacheName

        public void setCacheName(java.lang.String cacheName)
        Sets the cache name to the specified value. This name is the one that will be used for the folder in the cache directory.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - New name for the cache.

      • setCenter

        public void setCenter(double lat,
             double lng)
        Sets the enter of the MapView to the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        lat - Latitude.
        lng - Longitude.

      • setClickable

        public void setClickable(boolean clickable)
        Sets whether or not the view respond to touch events.
        Parameters:
        clickable - True to make the view touchable, false to reject touch events.

      • setContext

        public void setContext(Activity context)
        Sets the context where the view is going to be added.
        Parameters:
        context - New context.

      • setGraphicFactory

        public void setGraphicFactory(org.mapsforge.map.android.graphics.AndroidGraphicFactory graphicFactory)
        Sets the AndroidGraphicFactory that is going to be used for render the tiles. If the instance does not exist, a new one will be created.
        Parameters:
        graphicFactory - Instance of AndroidGraphicFactory( AndroidGraphicFactory.INSTANCE;).

      • setMapFilePath

        public void setMapFilePath(java.lang.String mapFilePath)
        Sets the map file for the offline rendering.
        Parameters:
        mapFilePath - Absolute path to the map file. This file must have map extension.

      • setMaxZoom

        public void setMaxZoom(byte zoom)
        Sets the maximum zoom for the map. Tiles over it will not be rendered.
        Parameters:
        zoom - Maximum zoom.

      • setMinZoom

        public void setMinZoom(byte zoom)
        Sets the minimum zoom for the map. Tiles under that zoom will not be rendered.
        Parameters:
        zoom - Minimum zoom.

      • setOffline

        public void setOffline(java.lang.String mapFilePath,
              java.lang.String renderThemePath)
        Changes the tile layer from online tile provider to the offline tile renderer.
        Parameters:
        mapFilePath - Absolute path to the map file that will be rendered.
        renderThemePath - Absolute path to the theme file that will be used. If null is passed, the default theme will be applied.

      • setOnline

        public void setOnline(java.lang.String providerName,
             java.lang.String host,
             java.lang.String baseUrl,
             java.lang.String extension,
             int port)
        Changes the offline tile renderer to an online tile provider.
        Parameters:
        providerName - Name of the provider. Eg: MapQuest
        host - Host
        baseUrl - Base URL
        extension - Tile extension. Eg: png
        port - Port. Eg: 80

      • setRenderThemePath

        public void setRenderThemePath(java.lang.String renderThemePath)
        Changes the render theme to the one specified in this method. If no one is provided, or it is not valid, the default theme will be applied.
        Parameters:
        renderThemePath - Absolute path to the theme file.

      • setZoom

        public void setZoom(byte zoom)
        Changes the view to the specified zoom.
        Parameters:
        zoom - New zoom.

      • show

        public void show()
        Shows the MapView. This is useful since it is not possible to change the visibility of the view from the cordova application.
        See Also:
        hide()

      • showScaleBar

        public void showScaleBar(boolean showScaleBar)
        Sets the visibility of the scale bar in the MapView.
        Parameters:
        showScaleBar - True to show the scale bar, false to hide it.
